vendor_name: Pullman Bunker Bay Resort, Margaret River Region
title: Margaret River Region Five-Star Pullman Retreat with Direct Beach Access, Daily Breakfast & Dining Credit
description:
Experience five-star Pullman luxury in Western Australia's Margaret River Region at the exceptional Pullman Bunker Bay Resort. Perched alongside the pristine sands of the near-private Bunker Bay with direct access to the beach, this tranquil retreat is set among 35 acres of breathtaking native landscape, where you can float away in the heated infinity-edge swimming pool. Indulge in an evening of culinary delight at Other Side of the Moon Restaurant and Bar, where Executive Chef Mo Arun showcases local and indigenous flavours perfectly paired with the region's applauded homegrown wines.

With its serene beachfront setting and five-star facilities - including two tennis courts, a fitness centre, complimentary Saturday yoga classes and a premier day spa - Pullman Bunker Bay Resort is the perfect launchpad to soak up the spectacular surrounds of the Margaret River region. Follow salt-licked walking trails and unearth Cape Naturaliste's majestic coastline, savour the region's gourmet food and wine scene at chef-hatted restaurants and cellar doors and delve into pristine scenery, made up of karri tree forests, majestic caves and renowned vineyards.
location_description: Pullman Bunker Bay Resort, Margaret River Region
offer_address: 42 Bunker Bay Road, Naturaliste, Western Australia 6281, Australia

vendor_name: Pullman Bunker Bay Resort, Margaret River Region
title: Five-Star Margaret River Region Pullman Retreat with Direct Beach Access & Daily Breakfast
description:
Experience five-star Pullman Luxury in Western Australia's Margaret River Region at the exceptional Pullman Bunker Bay Resort. Nestled alongside the pristine, white sands of the near-private Bunker Bay, this award-winning retreat is stamped with a Tripadvisor Travellers' Choice 2020 badge and set among 35 acres of breathtaking native landscape, where you can float away in the heated infinity-edge swimming pool and enjoy a cocktail at the seasonal pool bar.

With its serene beachfront setting and five-star facilities - including two tennis courts, a fitness centre, complimentary Saturday yoga classes and a premier day spa - Pullman Bunker Bay Resort is the perfect launchpad to soak up the spectacular surrounds of the Margaret River region. Follow salt-licked walking trails and unearth Cape Naturaliste's majestic coastline, savour the region's gourmet food and wine scene at chef-hatted restaurants and cellar doors, and delve into pristine scenery, made up of karri tree forests, majestic caves and renowned vineyards.

**Your handpicked inclusions:**

- Prepare for a day of indulgence with a buffet breakfast overlooking the glittering waters of Bunker Bay
- Toast your escape with a welcome bottle of wine on arrival
- Make the most of a A$40 food and drink credit per villa to use at the onsite restaurant and bar
- Unwind with a 10% discount at the award-winning Vie Spa per person for a relaxing treatment

**Group upgrade available**: Want to take friends and family with you? Upgrade to a large Two-Bedroom Villa for up to four guests (of any age). Two-Bedroom Villas feature cathedral ceilings, a fully-equipped kitchen and laundry, and two bathrooms including an ensuite in the master bedroom, making it the ultimate home-away-from-home.
location_description: Pullman Bunker Bay Resort, Margaret River Region
offer_address: 42 Bunker Bay Road, Naturaliste, Western Australia 6281, Australia

vendor_name: Pullman Bunker Bay Resort, Margaret River Region
title: Award-Winning Margaret River Region Luxury Villas with Daily Breakfast & Nightly Drinks
description:
Experience five-star luxury in Western Australia's Margaret River wine region as you find yourself perched alongside the pristine sands of isolated Bunker Bay with direct access to the beach.

This tranquil retreat is set among 35 acres of breathtaking native landscapes. Indulge in an evening of culinary delights at Other Side of the Moon Restaurant & Bar, where Executive Chef Mo Arun showcases local and Indigenous flavours that are perfectly paired with the region's applauded wines, and float away in the heated infinity pool.

With its serene beachfront setting and five-star facilities - including two tennis courts, a fitness centre, complimentary Saturday yoga classes (advance booking required) and a world-class day spa - this resort is the perfect launchpad for adventures in the spectacular surrounds of the greater Margaret River region.

Follow salt-licked walking trails to unearth Cape Naturaliste's majestic coastline, savour the region's gourmet food and wine at chef-hatted restaurants and cellar doors, and delve into the pristine landscapes of karri tree forests and magnificent caves.
